markdownRemark.html:
El Niño

This is the one cocktail in the collection that I didn't create. My friend Josh Kelly devised this recipe, and on a trip to the beach after many iterations we pronounced it good. Right click and save the image to import into Highball.

Ingredients

  • 1oz Tequila
  • 1oz Pear liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/4oz Allspice dram
  • 1/4oz Simple syrup
  • 1 dash grapefruit bitters
  • 1 twist of lime

Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.
